summary:
Manage Cookie Consent

To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store
and/or access device information. Consenting to these technologies will allow
us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not
consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and
functions.

Functional Functional Always active

The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate
purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the
subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission
of a communication over an electronic communications network.

Preferences Preferences

The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of
storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user.

Statistics Statistics

The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical
purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for
anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on
the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third
party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually
be used to identify you.

Marketing Marketing

The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send
advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for
similar marketing purposes.

Manage options Manage services Manage vendors Read more about these purposes

Accept Deny View preferences Save preferences View preferences

Try for Free

## Formatic

#####

# 📊 Unify Your Workflow Effortlessly with Our Platform.

# Merge all your projects, collaborators, and resources in one convenient
location

  * Experience effortless organization with our platform, designed to be both user-friendly and powerful.
  * We offer versatile boards, organized lists, and clear visual cards that quickly show you everyone’s tasks and the progress being made. 
  * Perfect for managing every detail, from the big picture to the smallest tasks, it adapts to your needs whether you’re flying solo or working with a team.











Sign Up for Free Today

## Why Formatic?

📌 **Unified Task Management:** Formatic offers a digital whiteboard concept,
akin to a Kanban Board. Create, arrange, and share virtual sticky notes, each
signifying a task or piece of work. Simple, flexible, and powerful. Get a
clear view of who’s doing what and what needs to get done, whether you're
working solo or with a team..  
  
📝 **Collaborative Forms** : With Formatic Forms, create, share, and embed
custom forms for data collection and collaboration. Convert cards to forms,
share them with your team or network, and manage responses directly on your
Formatic board.  
  
🔄 **Google Integration:** Seamlessly connect with popular Google tools, such
as Google Tasks, Google Sheets, and Google Forms . Sync tasks, gather
information using forms, and streamline your workflow with our advanced
software.

Try Our Free Templates

##

## Agile Features that Amplify Your

## Productivity

###  Shared Boards for Collaborative Work

With boards for different teams, lists to stay on top of progress, and cards
that carry key tasks and assignments, Formatic allows you to manage and share
360° of the process on one platform, making it the ultimate to-do list app.

###  Formatic Forms: Powerful form creation and sharing

Create custom forms for data collection, collaboration, or sharing tasks.
Convert cards to forms, embed them on websites, or share via links. Responses
appear on your Formatic board for easy management.

###  Do more with your Google Forms data

Formatic automatically extracts and organizes data from Google Forms,
empowering you to visualize the information, add notes, quickly search
responses, and more.

###  Create custom boards to tackle any project

Starting a new project? With Formatic, you can create a custom board in no
time! Getting started is as easy as adding custom fields such as text areas,
check boxes, and dates for simplified data entry

###  Get the most out of Google Tasks

By integrating with Google Tasks, Formatic provides a full-screen view of your
lists, and automatically synchronizes with your Google Workspace, with even
more features than Tasksbaord

Sheets-iconCreated with Sketch.

###  Redefine what’s possible in Google Sheets

Transform your static tables, vertical or horizontal, into dynamic, manageable
Kanban boards. This integration not only organizes your data but also breathes
life into it by enabling Formatic's robust features. Apply due dates, labels,
and categorize data into different lists for efficient task and enjoy the
convenience of two-way sync  

## Formatic in Action

**Streamlined Project Management:** Whether it’s a team project or a personal
task list, Formatic ensures clarity and efficiency. Organize, prioritize, and
execute with precision.

**Enhanced Collaboration:** From consolidating team data to making sense of
feedback, Formatic boosts team collaboration and maximizes productivity.

**Adaptable for Every Industry:** Formatic is versatile, catering to every
industry and use case, making it the go-to solution for both teams and
individuals.

## Ready to Accelerate Your Productivity?

Kick bottlenecks to the curb with Formatic. Get started today in three easy
steps:

###  Step 1

Click the button below or register directly with your Google account

###  Step 2

Create your first board or link with Google Forms, Sheets, and Tasks.

###  Step 3

Put the power of Formatic’s easy-to-use tools to work for your projects.

It’s that simple!

Get Started WIth a Free Trial Now!
